mdRecord.dcterms:title: Liure d'architecture de Iaques Androuet du Cerceau: contenant les plans & dessaings de cinquante bastimens tous differens : pour instruire ceux qui desirent bastir, soient de petit, moyen, ou grand estat. : Auec declaration des membres & commoditez .. : Plus, breue declaration de la maniere & forme de toiser la maçonnerie de chacun logis
Livre d'architecture de Jaques Androuet du Cerceau
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Androuet du Cerceau, Jacques, active 1549-1584 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: [32] p., 50 plates on [69] leaves : ill. ; 42 cm. (fol)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Imprint from colophon on leaf D4. [original]
Captions on plates are in Latin. [original]
Also published in Latin in 1559 according to Brunet. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Bookplate of John, Earl of Bute. Armorial binding with motto "Honi soit [m]al y pense" - possibly the Earl of Rosebery, who used this motto on a bookplate. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 302. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Bookplate of John, Earl of Bute. Armorial binding with motto "Honi soit [m]al y pense" - possibly the Earl of Rosebery, who used this motto on a bookplate. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 302. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture--Early works to 1800
Architecture--Designs and plans
